alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; South End of the Lower Sierra; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 24 at 3:18AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 9 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central California. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Snow level lowering to pass level Saturday evening with a couple of inches of snow accumulating * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level lowering to pass level Saturday evening with a couple of inches snow accumulation possible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; South End of the Lower Sierra; Tehachapi
